---
name: Deployment checklist
about: Steps to deploy to Vercel and configure domain
---

- [ ] Create project in Vercel and connect to this GitHub repo
- [ ] Set Environment Variables in Vercel: SUPABASE_URL, SUPABASE_KEY, ADMIN_PASSCODE
- [ ] Add Domain `gajamatej.com` in Vercel dashboard and follow DNS steps
- [ ] Test RSVP flow on deployed site
- [ ] (Optional) Add custom certificate and redirect rules
